# The `OnDiskChainedHashTableGenerator` Class Template Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

## Description {#details}

Generates an on disk hash table.

This needs an <code>Info</code> that handles storing values into the hash table&#39;s payload and computes the hash for a given key. This should provide the following interface:


<ProgramListing>

<CodeLine><Highlight kind="keyword">class </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">ExampleInfo &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">public</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">typedef</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ExampleKey key&#95;type;   </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Must be copy constructible</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">typedef</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ExampleKey &amp;key&#95;type&#95;ref;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">typedef</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ExampleData <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/profiledata/instrprofreader-cpp/#ad674bc524f54fe7fb728ded6ae31d66d">data&#95;type</a>; </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Must be copy constructible</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">typedef</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ExampleData &amp;data&#95;type&#95;ref;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">typedef</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> uint32&#95;t hash&#95;value&#95;type; </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The type the hash function returns.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">typedef</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> uint32&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/profiledata/instrprofreader-cpp/#a098d428243cfee4c355f295ef47cf549">offset&#95;type</a>; </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The type for offsets into the table.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Calculate the hash for Key</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> hash&#95;value&#95;type <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/indexedinstrprof/#a26647986f25d6168afc4204fd79873df">ComputeHash</a>(key&#95;type&#95;ref Key);</Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Return the lengths, in bytes, of the given Key/Data pair.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> std::pair&lt;offset&#95;type, offset&#95;type&gt;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal">  EmitKeyDataLength(raw&#95;ostream &amp;Out, key&#95;type&#95;ref Key, data&#95;type&#95;ref Data);</Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Write Key to Out.  KeyLen is the length from EmitKeyDataLength.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> EmitKey(raw&#95;ostream &amp;Out, key&#95;type&#95;ref Key,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal">                      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/profiledata/instrprofreader-cpp/#a098d428243cfee4c355f295ef47cf549">offset&#95;type</a> KeyLen);</Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Write Data to Out.  DataLen is the length from EmitKeyDataLength.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> EmitData(raw&#95;ostream &amp;Out, key&#95;type&#95;ref Key,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal">                       data&#95;type&#95;ref Data, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/profiledata/instrprofreader-cpp/#a098d428243cfee4c355f295ef47cf549">offset&#95;type</a> DataLen);</Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Determine if two keys are equal. Optional, only needed by contains.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> EqualKey(key&#95;type&#95;ref Key1, key&#95;type&#95;ref Key2);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;;</Highlight></CodeLine>

</ProgramListing>
